title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-2.4 - Persons from whom records may be obtained
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-2.4 - Persons from whom records may be obtained

State Regulations

All requests to inspect and/or copy records subject to disclosure as provided by this Subpart are to be made to the appropriate records access officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
50-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
